summary: University College London (UCL) is a top research university in England, part of the University of London. Founded in 1826, it was the first secular university in England and one of the first to admit women. UCL has a big campus in London and another in Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park. It's known for its museums, research, and famous alumni, like the discoverer of DNA's structure and members of the band Coldplay. UCL is very important for the UK's economy and is part of a large health science center. It has 11 faculties and many departments, and its research is world-class.
title: University College London
